item.description:
A Manifestation Vision Board is a visual representation of all your desires.  The purpose of this board is to keep you constantly thinking of what you want which will activate the law of attraction. The law of attraction basically states that we attract into our lives those things that we give the most thought and feeling to, whether they are negative or positive. This is why it is imperative that you focus on the things that you want rather than those you don’t. So, according to this law if you constantly say, “I never have ......” then you are perpetuating your lack of.....

In this Workshop you will create a manifestation board after a guided meditation. This workshop will be a reminder of your ability to open doors for changes, wisdom, love and healing for the Year.

Please Bring:

  • Poster Board - any size
  • Magazine clippings
  • Bring your journal; arrange your vision  on the cover of a journal that you write in frequently along with your manifestation grid! Yes, glue your vision statements and images right to the cover of your journal! A vision is meant to be seen and used.
  • You can choose to bring markers or paint

We will begin with our blank canvas and then we will look in magazines and papers for photographs and words that embody things you desire to create in your life, or you can get out the markers and paints and create words yourself.

Come enjoy this Fun and very Powerful class!  We will have light snacks!

group.name: The Light Within - Yoga, Reiki, Meditation - Dorchester MA

item.name: Manifestation Vision Board Workshop
